name: LifeForm
0:
”Alexa open life form”
”Alexa ask life form for a fact”
”Alexa ask life form to tell me a fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: life form
des:
Ask for animal facts and learn interesting and cool things about animals.

Life Form provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Life Form" or "Alexa, open Life Form" to get a fact".

At any time, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
